response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. Considering its worth to both of us, I propose a fair price of $9,500 for the product. This offer allows me to maintain a reasonable profit while ensuring you receive a high-quality item that meets your expectations. I believe this price strikes a balance between value and cost, making it an attractive proposition for both parties. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
